channel.title: Big problem
channel.description: I am using Hybrid pvp v3 at the moment, and it seems its a dupe system in trade. If someone example trade me dclaws, and both accept his item will not be removed. And i will get the dclaws, anyone know how to fix?

item.title: Big problem
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Chaotic-land, post:7, topic:431423”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=534102.msg3904863#msg3904863 date=1328138498]

it would be over, when u delete the source/client/cache, empty ur trash bin, never downloader a hybrid pvp again

or add a doubble backslash (//) in front of the line

 public final int string playerData[]

that should fix it.

if that dosnt work you could do /* at the beginning of every file.
[/quote]

Thanks but i figured out the problem myself ;)[/quote]

im quite glad you did

Read full topic

item.title: Big problem
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Don’t use PI, simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Big problem
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

[quote=“Chaotic-land, post:1, topic:431423”]I am using Hybrid pvp v3 at the moment, and it seems its a dupe system in trade.
If someone example trade me dclaws, and both accept his item will not be removed.
And i will get the dclaws, anyone know how to fix?[/quote]

Fixing item dupes are a huge pain and usually happen due to some code malfunctions. If you want to spend the time trying to fix it source sided, be my guest, but your best bet is to try another client. I know that DSPK is usually compatible with Hybrid PVP, so best of luck.

Read full topic
